text: Prorok blizhe k veruyushchim, chem oni sami [drug k drugu], a yego zheny - ikh materi. Soglasno Pisaniyu Allakha, krovnyye rodstvenniki blizhe drug k drugu, chem veruyushchiye [medintsy] i mukhadzhiry [po pravu nasledovaniya], yesli tol'ko vy ne zaveshchayete [chast' imushchestva] svoim druz'yam. Vse eto nachertano v Pisanii
